xxx.inout_posting_date AS inoutPostingDate, xxx.in_out_type_name AS inOutTypeName, xxx.company_id AS companyId, xxx.company_code AS companyCode, xxx.company_name AS companyName, xxx.consigner AS consigner, xxx.qty AS qty, xxx.buy_accept_id AS buyAcceptId, xxx.sap_id AS sapId, xxx.sap_code AS sapCode, FROM mes_wms_stockinout
mapper.select:
select
from mes_wms_stockinout
is_valid = '1'
and id = #{id}
and stock_in_out_code like concat('%',#{stockInOutCode},'%')
and frob like concat('%',#{frob},'%')
and in_out_type_propert like concat('%',#{inOutTypePropert},'%')
and in_out_type_id = #{inOutTypeId}
and in_out_type_code like concat('%',#{inOutTypeCode},'%')
and bill_code like concat('%',#{billCode},'%')
and suppliar_id = #{suppliarId}
and suppliar_code like concat('%',#{suppliarCode},'%')
and suppliar_name like concat('%',#{suppliarName},'%')
and client_id = #{clientId}
and client_code like concat('%',#{clientCode},'%')
and client_name like concat('%',#{clientName},'%')
and stock_manager_id like concat('%',#{stockManagerId},'%')
and stock_manager_code like concat('%',#{stockManagerCode},'%')
and stock_manager_name like concat('%',#{stockManagerName},'%')
and inspect_id = #{inspectId}
and inspect_code like concat('%',#{inspectCode},'%')
and inspect_name like concat('%',#{inspectName},'%')
and settle_date
and year like concat('%',#{year},'%')
and period like concat('%',#{period},'%')
and currency_id = #{currencyId}
and currency_code like concat('%',#{currencyCode},'%')
and exchange_rate
and stock_id = #{stockId}
and stock_code like concat('%',#{stockCode},'%')
and stock_name like concat('%',#{stockName},'%')
and back_flushed like concat('%',#{backFlushed},'%')
and client_id_receive = #{clientIdReceive}
and client_code_receive like concat('%',#{clientCodeReceive},'%')
and client_name_receive like concat('%',#{clientNameReceive},'%')
and receive_address like concat('%',#{receiveAddress},'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and f_manager_id = #{fManagerId}
and f_manager_code like concat('%',#{fManagerCode},'%')
and f_manager_name like concat('%',#{fManagerName},'%')
and sale_type like concat('%',#{saleType},'%')
and postyle like concat('%',#{postyle},'%')
and source_type like concat('%',#{sourceType},'%')
and source_id = #{sourceId}
and source_code like concat('%',#{sourceCode},'%')
and department_id = #{departmentId}
and department_code like concat('%',#{departmentCode},'%')
and department_name like concat('%',#{departmentName},'%')
and emp_id = #{empId}
and emp_code like concat('%',#{empCode},'%')
and emp_name like concat('%',#{empName},'%')
and manager_id = #{managerId}
and manager_code like concat('%',#{managerCode},'%')
and manager_name like concat('%',#{managerName},'%')
and status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
and upt_state like concat('%',#{uptState},'%')
and up_stock_when_save like concat('%',#{upStockWhenSave},'%')
and checker_id = #{checkerId}
and checker_name like concat('%',#{checkerName},'%')
and checker_time
and order_id = #{orderId}
and order_code like concat('%',#{orderCode},'%')
and task_id = #{taskId}
and task_code like concat('%',#{taskCode},'%')
and organization_id = #{organizationId}
and organization_code like concat('%',#{organizationCode},'%')
and organization_name like concat('%',#{organizationName},'%')
and create_id = #{createId}
and create_name like concat('%',#{createName},'%')
and create_time
and update_id = #{updateId}
and update_name like concat('%',#{updateName},'%')
and update_time
and remark like concat('%',#{remark},'%')
and is_valid like concat('%',#{isValid},'%')
and inout_date like concat('%',#{inoutDate},'%')
and inout_posting_date like concat('%',#{inoutPostingDate},'%')
and in_out_type_name like concat('%',#{inOutTypeName},'%')
and company_id = #{companyId}
and company_code like concat('%',#{companyCode},'%')
and company_name like concat('%',#{companyName},'%')
and consigner like concat('%',#{consigner},'%')
and qty
and buy_accept_id = #{buyAcceptId}
and sap_id = #{sapId}
and sap_code like concat('%',#{sapCode},'%')
order by id desc
